description: A hefty raw sausage, prepared for smoking or cooking.
A hefty sausage that has been cured and smoked for long term storage.
A hefty cooked sausage.  Better eat it hot and fresh.
Salted meat slowly cooked in butter or melted fat, a form of food preservation from the days before canning.  Rich and fatty, it will last for a long time.
A sweet and delicious maple-flavored sausage.  Better eat it hot and fresh.
A type of German sausage made of pre-cooked meat and blood.  Better eat it hot and fresh.

description: A type of German sausage made of finely-chopped meat, meant to be pan-fried or roasted.  Better eat it hot and fresh.

description: A chunk of meat coated with royal jelly.  It's a lot like a honey-baked ham.
A thick slab of salty cured bacon.  Shelf stable, precooked and ready-to-eat, it tastes better when reheated.
//: I am not sure how much a 'charge' is meant to be, but a slice is around 10mL displacement volume, with a weight of 8g and about 40kcal.  Based this on that.

description: Lean sausage made from heavily salt-cured offal, with natural gut casing.  Waste not, want not.
Lean raw sausage made from heavily salt-cured offal, ready to be smoked.
Also known as pork rinds or chicharrones, these are bits of edible fat and skin that have been fried until they are crispy and delicious.
A tender piece of meat, perfectly seasoned with a thin sweet glaze and a vegetable accompaniment.  A gourmet dish that is both healthy and delicious.
Fresh lobster meat, perfectly seasoned with lemon juice and a vegetable accompaniment.  A gourmet dish that is both healthy and delicious.
Sausage covered in a curry ketchup sauce.  Spicy and delicious!

//: Same as the meat it's been made from.  It's additional ingredient compared to smoking, jerking, and dehydrating, so there's no incentive otherwise.
description: A dish in which meat or fish is set into a gelatin made from a meat or vegetable stock.
Dehydrated fish flakes.  With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.
Reconstituted fish flakes, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.
Dehydrated lobster meat.  With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.
Reconstituted lobster meat, which is much more enjoyable to eat now that it has been rehydrated.
Dehydrated mollusk meat.  With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.
Reconstituted mollusk meat, which is much more enjoyable to eat now that it has been rehydrated.
A serving of crisply brined and canned fish.  Tasty and nutritious.
Low-sodium boiled and canned fish.  Contains most of the nutrition, but little of the savor of cooked fish.
Low-sodium boiled and canned lobster.  Contains most of the nutrition, but little of the savor of cooked lobster.
A delicious pair of golden-brown crispy fried frog legs.
A delicious golden-brown serving of crispy fried fish.
A delicious deep-fried biscuit loaded with crab meat.

description: A delicious deep-fried biscuit loaded with lobster meat.
Quahog clams stuffed with bread crumbs and fried.
Meat that has been cooked, preserved, and cut into thin slices for convenient sandwich construction.  It tastes fine cold.

//: Rebalanced: the recipe looks to easily make two pounds.
description: Formally known as Bologna sausage, this is a finely-ground preserved meat that comes in circular slices.  Its first name isn't Oscar.  You can eat it cold.
Preserved fish that has been dried in a lye solution.  Vile and soap-like yet highly nutritious, it is reminiscent of the afterbirth of a dog or the world's largest chunk of phlegm.

//: SPAM comes in cans of six 2 oz slices.  Each charge is one slice.
description: A canned pork product that is unnaturally pink, oddly rubbery, and not very tasty.  Quite filling, but completely unappetizing cold.
A mysterious lump of SPAM that contains just enough calories and vitamins to feed you for a day.  For debug use only.
//: This is used for the all_nutrient_starve_test.

description: Salty little fish.  They'll make you thirsty.

//: Semi-arbitrary spoilage of 48 hours set: pretty confident sausage gravy goes bad.
description: Biscuits, meat, and delicious mushroom soup all crammed together into a wonderfully greasy and tasty mush.

A concentrated mixture of fat and protein, first said to have been used as a nutritious high-energy food by the Querecho and Teya people of what is Texas today.  Composed of meat, tallow, and edible berries, it provides excellent nutrition in an easy to carry form.

A concentrated mixture of fat and protein, first said to have been used as a nutritious high-energy food by the Querecho and Teya people of what is Texas today.  Composed of meat, tallow, and edible plants or mushrooms, it provides excellent nutrition in an easy to carry form.

A concentrated mixture of fat and protein, first said to have been used as a nutritious high-energy food by the Querecho and Teya people of what is Texas today.  Composed of meat and tallow, it provides excellent nutrition in an easy to carry form.  Contains no fruits or veggies.
Some mac and cheese with ground meat added, enhancing the flavor and nutritional value.
Meat encased in little dough satchels.  Tastes fine straight from the can.
A spicy stew containing chili peppers, meat, tomatoes and beans.
Greasy Prospector brand improved pork and beans with hickory smoked pig fat chunks.
Now with 95 percent fewer dolphins!
Bright pink fish-paste from a can.
Off-white chicken-paste from a can.
Fish fillets pickled in some sort of tangy white sauce.
Chopped quahog clams in water.
Delicious, lumpy, white soup made of meat (traditionally clams) and potatoes in a milk base.  A taste of the lost glory of New England.
Slow-cooked beans with meat.  Tasty and very filling.
Delicious fried rice with meat.  Tasty and very filling.
Slow-cooked beans and rice with meat and seasonings.  Tasty and very filling.
A delicious baked pie with a hearty meat filling.
A meat pizza, for all the carnivores out there.  Chock-full of minced meat and heavily seasoned.
A supreme pizza with ALL the toppings.
Fluffy and delicious scrambled eggs made even better with the addition of tasty meat or fish.
Low-sodium boiled and canned meat.  Contains most of the nutrition, but little of the savor of cooked meat.
Meat slices cured in brine.  Salty but tasty in a pinch.
Spaghetti covered with a thick meat sauce.  Yum!
A very old type of pasta made with several layers of lasagne sheets alternated with cheese, sauce and meat.
Now that it's been fried, this SPAM is actually pretty tasty.
A sandwich of minced meat and cheese with condiments.  A simple favorite of the people before the Cataclysm.
A wheat-free sandwich of minced meat and cheese with condiments.  A simple favorite of the people before the Cataclysm.
A cheeseburger with more vegetables and condiments.  This is the apex of pre-Cataclysm culinary achievement.
A wheat-free cheeseburger with more vegetables and condiments.  This is the apex of pre-Cataclysm culinary achievement.
A sandwich of minced meat with condiments.
A wheat-free sandwich of minced meat with condiments.
A sandwich consisting of ground meat and tomato sauce served on bread.
A sandwich consisting of ground meat and tomato sauce served on wheat-free bread.
A traditional Mexican dish composed of a corn tortilla folded or rolled around a meat filling.

Frybread topped with beans, meat, and lettuce.  Originally conceived by the Navajo in the 19th century, only having available basic foodstuffs provided by the US-government after forced expulsion from their homelands, this dish became popular with many Native Americans and is often served at Powwows or other festivities.
A serving of crisply brined and canned meat.  Tasty and nutritious.
Dehydrated meat flakes.  With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.
A pair of dehydrated frog legs.  With proper storage, this dried food will remain edible for an incredibly long time.
Reconstituted frog legs, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.
Reconstituted meat flakes, which are much more enjoyable to eat now that they have been rehydrated.

//: That's whisky without an 'e' because we're talking about Scotch whisky.
description: This traditional Scottish savory pudding is made of meat and offal mixed with oatmeal, sewn into an animal's stomach and boiled.  Surprisingly tasty and quite filling, it is best served with boiled root vegetables and strong whisky.
Delicious slivers of thinly-sliced raw fish, wrapped in tasty sushi rice and rolled up in a healthy green vegetable.
Delicious slivers of raw meat, wrapped in tasty sushi rice and rolled up in a healthy green vegetable.
Delicious slivers of thinly sliced raw fish, served with tasty vegetables.
Pieces of poisonous meat that have been dried to prevent them from rotting away.  They're still unsafe to eat.
Delicious cooked dumplings consisting of a meat filling wrapped in thin dough.

A traditional Mexican dish of meat, beans or rice, and vegetables spread on a corn tortilla and rolled into a tube shape.  The fresh ingredients make this one taste way better than those gas station knockoffs.
A round, seasoned lump of meat, ready to fry.
A seasoned and fried round lump of meat.  Just like mom used to make!

A traditional dish originating from Spain, more specifically from the region of Valencia.  A very tasty and filling dish made traditionally of rabbit, beans, rice, chicken, spices and sometimes snails.

A traditional dish originating from France, more specifically from the region of Bourgogne.  It consists of prepared snails that have then been cooked in butter and parsley inside their own shells, very low on fat but high on protein.
//: Nutrition information roughly based on a serving of 6 snails + butter and veggies. if you know more pls expand

description: Turkish flatbread topped with ground lamb or beef mixed with peppers, onions, and tomatoes.

Turkish flatbread topped with minced meat, minced vegetables, and herbs including onions, garlic, tomatoes, red peppers, and parsley, flavored with spices such as chili pepper and paprika, then baked.
A Turkish dish that consists of sliced dner kebab meat topped with hot tomato sauce over pieces of pita bread and generously slathered with melted special sheep's milk butter and yogurt.
Dumplings that typically consist of a spiced meat mixture, usually lamb or ground beef, wrapped in a thin dough sheet which is then boiled or steamed.
A traditional Turkish dish prepared by rolling rice and minced meat in grape leaves.
